message:
little bull
I Have a Few Class Ideas to Propose (in no particular order):

-Bicycle Mods/Enhancements/Experiments 
-Optics & Lens Applications & Theory 
-Acoustical Applications & Theory 
-Understanding, Building, Hacking, & Using Sensors 
-Lastly, "Classes" could be expanded to mean Group Research & Discussion, Collaborative Experimentation, and/or Group Projects.

I hope these aren't redundant.
Interested in how to make these classes happen sooner.  Maybe we'll have some type of form.  What are your feelings on this?
Interested: Understanding, Building, Hacking, & Using Sensors

Who can teach it, what can be worked into a syllabus, how many people, fees, schedule, in that order. The organizational tasks should fall to those interested in taking a class, abstractly, rather than those interested in teaching it.
well www.schoolofthefuture.org had a list of deficits that people could come along and teach - like we have 2 people interested in this class, what happens next?

if an instructor is unavailable, is it possible to reach out to a community of knowledgeable individuals on the topic and ask what resources, reviewed in order, might constitute a suitable introduction
that is where we are with the "Understanding, Building, Hacking, & Using Sensors" class
